  content: "By the end of this training module, you will be able to: understand
    the elements of common definitions of research infrastructures; be able to
    discuss the importance of issues such as sustainability and
    interoperability; understand how research infrastructure supports methods
    and communities; and be aware of some common critiques of digital research
    infrastructures in the Humanities."

By the end of this training module, you will be able to: understand the elements of common definitions of research infrastructures; be able to discuss the importance of issues such as sustainability and interoperability; understand how research infrastructure supports methods and communities; and be aware of some common critiques of digital research infrastructures in the Humanities.
